transArray.content: The hotel is quite quiet, and the front desk service is very good. Check-in is also very clean and safe. The elevators are equipped with alcohol-sensitive disinfectants. You can also wash and dry clothes on the first floor. It is very close to Chaoyang Railway Station. The stay experience is very good.

Dear guests, hello: I am very happy to see your recognition of our front desk service staff. Your satisfaction is the driving force for our progress. We will continue to work hard and have a bright future!
